name: Sangokushi III
overview:
Sangokushi III is an unlicensed fighting game for the Sega Master System released in South Korea by Game Line in 1994. It's based on the Taiwanese game series Sango Fighter (Sangokushi).

Interestingly, the programmer who worked on this game, Lee Sanghun, also worked on "GP Rider" for the Game Gear, a licensed title.
